plot outline: A newly married couple check into their honeymoon suite at a hotel but, their conjugal night begins with a chilling chain of sequences. The couple played by are very much in love, but the husband has doubts about his wife's fidelity and tries to find the other man in her life by installing web cameras in their desolate bungalow and even hires the services of a psychiatrist, who is also his childhood friend. The psychiatrist uses various psychiatric tools like putting the wife through extreme emotional trauma by posing as a prowling serial killer and using hypnosis to bring her sub -conscious to the fore. Finally, the treatment works and the wife blurts out her innermost secret.
title: Tee Ratra
plot: A suspicious husband goes to great lengths to spy on his wife.

A newly married couple check into their honeymoon suite at a hotel but, their conjugal night begins with a chilling chain of sequences. The couple played by are very much in love, but the husband has doubts about his wife's fidelity and tries to find the other man in her life by installing web cameras in their desolate bungalow and even hires the services of a psychiatrist, who is also his childhood friend. The psychiatrist uses various psychiatric tools like putting the wife through extreme emotional trauma by posing as a prowling serial killer and using hypnosis to bring her sub -conscious to the fore. Finally, the treatment works and the wife blurts out her innermost secret.::Everest Entertainment

Rajesh and Rajni are very much in love and get married they set out for honeymoon on their very first night Rajan decides to leave next day due to emergency in office.Rajni finds things are not well in the house but Rajan ignores her and leaves for office.But they are welcomed by a stranger at their door whose a vacuum cleaner salesman P Das.Rajan refuses at first but agrees for a demo next day,on the next day the Das enters the house in absence of Rajan and tortures Rajni to revel about her past and a person name Prakash.Rajan reaches home for some important work and finds Rajni being tortured by the Das who then stabs Rajan.The next day when Rajni wakes up and discuss's it with Rajan she finds that it was a bad dream.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
